scripts.build: lerna exec -- rollup -f cjs -o build/index.js -- index.js
scripts.bundle: cp packages/scale/scales.json packages/scale/build/ && cp packages/chord/chords.json packages/chord/build && cp packages/fretboard/tunings.json packages/fretboard/build/
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.dist: rm dist/* && browserify packages/tonal/build/index.js > dist/tonal.js && uglifyjs dist/tonal.js > dist/tonal.min.js && ls -hall dist/
